column4: The repositories added by Google Chrome (google-chrome.list in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ which links to http://dl.google.com/linux/deb) takes an INCREDIBLY long time during an apt-get update, and has for a good month now. Any word when this will be fixed?
That'd be entirely up to Google
Flannel: Yes but come on, this is GOOGLE we are talking about, and they're 2mb max repos. There has been no uproar over this? They have the bandwidth, come on.
We have nothing to do with them, if they want to be dysfunctional, thats their decision
